content:
Hi,

I pushed a new theory to afp-devel five days ago. CI built it and it showed up online on the corresponding web page:

https://devel.isa-afp.org/entries/Implicational_Logic.html

Then the CI build broke for a while and now the new theory is no longer there. The website above doesn't correspond to the state of the repo:

https://foss.heptapod.net/isa-afp/afp-devel/-/tree/branch/default/thys/Implicational_Logic?ref_type=heads

It looks like new builds are not presenting this theory agai. I'm inclined to just make a small change to it, to force an update, but I guess there's a cache issue somewhere in the pipeline? Or maybe this is expected for devel? I think some of the other commits around that time are also not reflected online.

Best,
Asta
The issue is that the CI build is still broken...
I have already noticed the author about the offending change.
Oh! They showed a green icon, so I didn't look into it. Thank you!
It's not so broken that we would mark it as red ;)
